links.title: Huge Leaks Reveal AMD's Ryzen 3000 Series: Up To 16 Cores And 5.1GHz Frequencies
links.description: A huge amount of information relating to AMD's 2019 plans with its 7nm Zen 2 Ryzen CPUs appears to have been leaked online, revealing 16-core models and boost frequencies up to 5.1GHz. I've speculated before that Zen 2 will see core count increases for AMD not just with its EPYC 2 CPUs, which has already been announced, but with desktop Ryzen and most likely Threadripper too.

links.title: After Dow drops, President Trump seeks to reassure investors on China
links.description: WASHINGTON - Amid market worries over mixed signals on Chinese trade talks, President Donald Trump on Wednesday expressed confidence that his team would reach a new deal with China - a day after his self-declaration as "tariff man" spooked investors. links.title: Apple gives in to negative pressure - Analysis - 05-12-2018
links.description: Apple's stock tumbled 4.40% in the last session, or 8.13 points, settling back below 177.07, representing the ratio 61.8% of Fibonacci retracement levels for an ascending wave in the medium term (from 142.21 to 233.47), amid negative pressure from the 50-day SMA, while the RSI reached overbought levels compared to the stock's movements.
